entry_groups.description:
Everyone is welcomed to join as long as you follow the rules! Feel free to ask questions! 

SESSIONS:
1) session: Coyodachi
2) pw: 5454
3) once you enter, put yourself on "STAY" 
4) we go in order of who enters first listed via chatlog
5) Coyo will call up who is next
6) ONLY fight against me (coyo); one match per person
7) leave session after your match with me so others can join

TEKKEN™8 & ©Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.

Hello Coyo! おはコヨー！It’s Coyo here!

I am a Coyote from Japari Park and it is a pleasure to meet everyone from around the world! My main language is English, and sometimes I speak in Japanese. entry_groups.description:
Open sessions! Come in your halloween custom costumes! 
Just be sure to keep costumes friendly, and respectful~ Rated E for Everyone

Everyone is welcomed to join as long as you follow the rules! Feel free to ask questions! 

SESSIONS:
1) session: Coyodachi
2) pw: 5454
3) once you enter, put yourself on "STAY" 
4) we go in order of who enters first listed via chatlog
5) Coyo will call up who is next
6) ONLY fight against me (coyo); one match per person
7) leave session after your match with me so others can join

TEKKEN™8 & ©Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.

Hello Coyo! おはコヨー！It’s Coyo here!

I am a Coyote from Japari Park and it is a pleasure to meet everyone from around the world! My main language is English, and sometimes I speak in Japanese. Other languages are also welcomed in chat but I’m sorry if I am unable to understand - I am still studying multiple languages and hope to understand more in the future! I am looking forward to spending time with everyone!~🐾🐾🐾🐾
